at Leiden University (Leiden, The Netherlands) and

tspan.tspan: Structure Determination of Outer Membrane Protein G

text.tspan: in Native Lipids by Solid-State NMR in the group of
Prof. Dr. Hartmut Oschkinat at the Leibniz-Institut für
High School Sint Oelbert Gymnasium (Oosterhout, The Netherlands)
Master thesis project involving expression of an
RNA hairpin for solution state NMR spectroscopy
Supervisor: Prof. Dr. Joseph D. Puglisi
Groupe de RMN biomoléculaire at the Institut de Biologie Structurale
(Grenoble, France) Short research project involving the assignment of
solution NMR NOESY spectra of a methyl labeled protein.
Metallo-Protein Group at Leiden Insititute of Chemistry
(Leiden, The Netherlands) Last project for Bachelor's education.
Subject: dynamics of the breast cancer type 1 susceptibility (BRCA1)
protein in the cell after the introduction of DNA breaks, studied by
